schools_additional.name: California Institute of Technology
schools_additional.description: Caltech is a world-renowned science and engineering institute, known for its small size and intense focus on research. Home to famous scientists and astronauts.
schools_additional.motto: The truth shall set you free

schools_additional.name: Columbia University
schools_additional.description: Columbia University is an Ivy League university in Manhattan, NYC, known for journalism, law, and medicine. Founded in 1754.
schools_additional.motto: In lumine Tuo videimus lumen (In Thy light shall we see light)

schools_additional.name: University of Chicago
schools_additional.description: UChicago is a leading research university known for its rigorous academics and the Chicago School of Economics. Founded in 1890.
schools_additional.motto: Crescat scientia; vita excolatur (Let knowledge grow and life be enriched)

schools_additional.name: University College London
schools_additional.description: UCL is a world-leading multidisciplinary university, founded in 1826 as the first university to admit students regardless of gender or religion.
schools_additional.motto: Cuncti adsint meritaeque expectent praemia palmae (Let all come who by merit deserve the most reward)

schools_additional.name: École Polytechnique Fédérale de Lausanne
schools_additional.description: EPFL is one of the world's leading science and technology universities, known for research excellence and innovation. Founded in 1853.
schools_additional.motto: Creating a sustainable future

schools_additional.name: Fudan University
schools_additional.description: Fudan University is one of China's most prestigious universities, known for its humanities and sciences programs. Founded in 1905.
schools_additional.motto: Rich knowledge and perseverance

schools_additional.name: Shanghai Jiao Tong University
schools_additional.description: SJTU is one of China's oldest and most prestigious universities, known for engineering and medicine. Founded in 1896.
schools_additional.motto: 飲水思源 愛國榮校 (Drink water, think of its source)

schools_additional.name: Nanyang Technological University
schools_additional.description: NTU is Singapore's second-oldest public university, known for research excellence and innovation. Founded in 1981.
schools_additional.motto: Nanyang Technological University

schools_additional.name: Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology
schools_additional.description: KAIST is Korea's leading science and technology university, known for research and innovation. Founded in 1971.
schools_additional.motto: The Creative Wisdom for the Frontier

schools_additional.name: University of Sydney
schools_additional.description: The University of Sydney is Australia's oldest university, known for academic excellence and beautiful architecture. Founded in 1850.
schools_additional.motto: Sic itur ad astra (Thus do we go to the stars)

schools_additional.name: McGill University
schools_additional.description: McGill University is Canada's leading university, known for medical school and research excellence. Founded in 1821.
schools_additional.motto: Grandescere Aude (Dare to Grow)

schools_additional.name: University of Toronto
schools_additional.description: U of T is Canada's leading public research university, known for innovation and diversity. Founded in 1827.
schools_additional.motto: Velut arbor aevo (As a tree through the ages)

schools_additional.name: LMU Munich
schools_additional.description: LMU Munich is one of Germany's most prestigious universities, known for research excellence across disciplines. Founded in 1472.
schools_additional.motto: No truthful description can be given of truth

schools_additional.name: Sorbonne University
schools_additional.description: Sorbonne University is a world-renowned university in Paris, famous for humanities, law, and medicine. Originates from University of Paris (1257).
schools_additional.motto: Docere, Studere, Condere (Teach, Learn, Create)

schools_additional.name: The Chinese University of Hong Kong
schools_additional.description: CUHK is a leading research university in Hong Kong, known for its bilingual education and comprehensive programs. Founded in 1963.
schools_additional.motto: 博文約禮 (Through learning and temperance to virtue)

schools_additional.name: The University of Hong Kong
schools_additional.description: HKU is the oldest tertiary institution in Hong Kong, founded in 1911, known for academic excellence and global outlook.
schools_additional.motto: Sapientia et Virtus (Wisdom and Virtue)

schools_additional.name: St. Paul's College
schools_additional.description: St. Paul's College is one of the oldest secondary schools in Hong Kong, established in 1856 by the Anglican Church.
schools_additional.motto: In All Things Charity

schools_additional.name: Diocesan Girls' School
schools_additional.description: DGS is a prestigious all-girls secondary school in Hong Kong, known for academic excellence and music programs. Founded in 1860.
schools_additional.motto: Finis Coronat Opus (The End Crowns the Work)

schools_additional.name: St. Joseph's College
schools_additional.description: St. Joseph's College is a prestigious Catholic boys' school in Hong Kong, known for academic and sports excellence. Founded in 1860.
schools_additional.motto: Ad Majorem Dei Gloriam (For the Greater Glory of God)

schools_additional.name: Kowloon Preparatory School
schools_additional.description: KPS is a leading preparatory school in Hong Kong, providing British-based education for young learners. Founded in 1920s.
schools_additional.motto: Love, Laughter, Learning
